unit_rules.name: Node Lash
unit_rules.text: While leading a unit, all models in the unit have +1 to Hit rolls. If the target is Battle-Shocked, all models in the unit also have +1 to Wound rolls.

unit_rules.name: Psychic Terror
unit_rules.text: All enemy units have -1 to the Battle-Shock tests that they must take as a result of unleashing the Shadow in the Warp. (This effect does not stack with multiple Neurotyrants).

unit_rules.name: Synaptic Relay
unit_rules.text: At the start of the Battle Round, select up to two friendly +Tyranids+ units within 12". Place a Neuraloid token with them. Until the end of the Battle Round, the selected units are always considered to be in Synapse Range.
